meta.description: Experienced criminal defense lawyers in Anne Arundel County, MD. Get a free consultation today and take the first step towards protecting your rights.

content.h1: Criminal Defense in Anne Arundel County
content.intro: If you're facing criminal charges in Anne Arundel County, MD, you need an experienced attorney on your side. With over 4,000 cases since 2005, Lonny 'The Street Lawyer' Bramzon, Esq., and his team at Street Lawyer Magic have the knowledge and expertise to help you navigate the system.

sections.heading: Why Choose Street Lawyer Magic
sections.body: We're a highly respected law firm with a proven track record of aggressive defense. With years of experience, we'll work tirelessly to protect your rights and achieve the best possible outcome for you.

sections.heading: Our Criminal Defense Experience in Anne Arundel County
sections.body: As local attorneys, we have an intimate understanding of the Anne Arundel County courts and the laws that govern our community. We'll use this knowledge to your advantage in building a strong defense.

sections.heading: What We Do For You
sections.body:
• Aggressive representation in all types of criminal cases
  • Personalized attention and care for each client
  • Effective strategy development to achieve the best possible outcome
  • 24/7 emergency services available when you need us most

content.cta: Get a free consultation with Lonny 'The Street Lawyer' Bramzon, Esq. today at 240-478-2189.
